document.title: Synology DS107e : rdiff-galres
document.author: Laurent
document.text: Je souhaitais faire des sauvegardes de mon disque externe sur mon DS107e en utilisant la commande rdiff-backup monte certains repertoires en CIFS rencontre mes premieres difficultes rdiff-backup Using rdiff-backup to backup files to a server mounted via smbfs or CIFS has been a troublesome configuration for some users. Mounting via smbfs tends to be more reliable than CIFS, although it is deprecated on Linux and does not support files greater than 2 GB. See the FAQ for more on this setup. rdiff-backup Tant pis, ou plutot tant mieux, car jai eu une meilleur idee : installer rdiff-backup cron rdiff-backup cron ipkg rdiff-backup Exception ''module' object has no attribute 'gettempdir'' raised of class 'exceptions.AttributeError': rdiff-backup rsync installe et configure
